data.title: Ian McLagan Troublemaker Canadian Vinyl LP
data.meta_description: IAN MCLAGAN Troublemaker (1980 Canadian 10-track vinyl LP debut from the former Small Faces and Faces keyboardist, housed in a picture sleeve with 'beware... heavyweight musicians playing on this album' caption, including Stanley Clarke, KeithRichards, Ron Wood and Ringo Starr. The sleeve shows a little shelfwear whilst the vinyl appears barely played SRM1-3786) Tracklisting & Info: 1. La De Da (2:25) 2. Headlines (3:00) 3. Truly (5:58) 4. Somebody (2:58) 5. Movin' Out (3:52) 6. Little Troublemaker (2:26) 7. If It's Alright (2:00) 8. Sign (3:24) 9. Hold On (3:43) 10. Mystifies Me (5:25) Year of Release - 1980 Format - vinyl LP album (LP record) Record Label - Mercury Catalogue No - SRM1-3786 Country of Origin - Canada Availability - In Stock

IAN MCLAGAN Troublemaker (1980 Canadian 10-track vinyl LP debut from the former Small Faces and Faces keyboardist, housed in a picture sleeve with 'beware... heavyweight musicians playing on this album' caption, including Stanley Clarke, KeithRichards, Ron Wood and Ringo Starr. The sleeve shows a little shelfwear whilst the vinyl appears barely played SRM1-3786)

10. Mystifies Me (5:25)
